description: Rear dormer roof extension incorporating a Juliet balcony, and installation of two roof lights to front roof slope
decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
Reason: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).

| The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing numbers: Site location plan; BP1 (Block plan); 01 (Existing and proposed ground and first floor plan); 02 (Existing and proposed loft and roof plan); 03 (Proposed loft plan); 04 (Existing and proposed front and rear elevations); 05 (Existing and proposed side elevation); 06 (Existing and proposed section A-A); 07 (Existing and proposed section B-B)
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interest of proper planning.
| Notwithstanding the details shown on the approved plans, no windows or other openings (other than those shown on the submitted plans) shall be formed in the walls or roof of the buildings.

Reason: To protect residential amenity in accordance with policies 1.1, 1.2 & 3.8 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policy D4 of the London Plan (2021), and the National Planning Policy Framework (2021).
| All proposed front roof lights shall be of the non-projecting Conservation Area type and shall be installed flush with the plane of the roof and shall be retained as such thereafter.

Reason: In the interests of ensuring a high quality of design that preserves or enhances the character and appearance of the Ealing Green Conservation Area, in accordance with policies 7.4, 7B and 7C of the Ealing Development Management Plan (2013) and policies D4 and HC1 of the London Plan (2021).
